LanguageData.ButcheryFleshEfficiency.label: ефективність розбору тіл
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshEfficiency.description: The amount of meat produced when butchering flesh creatures.\n\nThe actual amount is also related to the creature's size.
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshSpeed.label: швидкість розбирання тіл
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshSpeed.description: The speed at which this person butchers flesh creatures.
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidEfficiency.label: ефективність розчленовування механоїдів
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidEfficiency.description: Кількість матеріалів, отриманих цією людиною при розчленовуванні мертвого механоїда.\n\nКількість також залежить від розміру механоїда.
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidSpeed.label: швидкість розчленовування механоїдів
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidSpeed.description: Швидкість, з якою ця людина може розчленувати механоїда на корисні матеріали.
LanguageData.CookSpeed.label: швидкість приготування
LanguageData.CookSpeed.description: The speed at which this person cooks meals.
LanguageData.DrugCookingSpeed.label: drug cooking speed
LanguageData.DrugCookingSpeed.description: The speed at which this person brews beer and tea, or makes simple drug products like smokeleaf joints.
LanguageData.DrugSynthesisSpeed.label: drug synthesis speed
LanguageData.DrugSynthesisSpeed.description: How fast this character synthesizes complex chemical drugs.
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChance.label: вірогідність отруїти їжу
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChance.description: The probability that this character will inadvertently poison a meal they cook.\n\nAnyone who eats a food-poisoned meal will be temporarily debilitated with pain, weakness, and vomiting.
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChance.labelForFullStatList: food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)
LanguageData.GeneralLaborSpeed.label: general labor speed
LanguageData.GeneralLaborSpeed.description: The speed at which this person carries out general labor like making stone blocks, making chemfuel at a refinery, burning items, tailoring clothes, creating art, smithing armor and weapons or smelting slag. This stat applies both to activities that involve no skill, as well as those where the skill affects the quality of the product instead of the speed of production.
LanguageData.SmeltingSpeed.label: швидкість виплавки
LanguageData.SmeltingSpeed.description: The speed at which this person smelts things.\n\nSince smelting is dumb labor, smelting speed is not affected by any skill.
